content: crochet boxed block bookmark - never lose your place in the book you are reading with this quick simple bookmark make in different colours for different types of books ie factual fun thriller or a general story the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 10 x 1 5 inches excluding tassel level intermediate 1 https //crochetncreate com/boxed-block-crochet-bookmark/
